name: verify-major-event-details-in-text-view-traffic-hazard-page;issue-lt-396c-text-view-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt25-text-view-lt-396-current-and-future-incident-list-capability-lt-25-text-view

tags.name: LT 25 Text View/LT-396 Current and Future incident list

title: Verify Major event details in text view Traffic Hazard page

userStory.storyName: LT-396 Current and Future incident list

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I click on the menu button
Then I click "List View" button from the menu list
Then I should see "All incident types" filter is turned off by default
When I turn "on" All incident type filter
When I turn "off" All incident type filter
When I select "Public Event" from All Incident type
Then search for incident "Turramurra"
Then I should see the incident "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives" with the Accordian functionality
Then I should see incident name as "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives" and incident location as "Bobbin Head Rd, Mona Vale Rd"
Then I should see incident type as "Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Sunday 29 March" and incident region as "Sydney North"

Then I should see below incident details
| Title_Name | Info |
| Date & Time | Fri 6 Mar 2020 till Fri 6 Mar 2020 |
| Traffic Arrangements | Special Event Clearways |
| Advice | Exercise caution |
| Advice | Allow extra travel time |
| Other Advice | Up to 5,000 riders will participate in the annual Bobbin Head Cycle Classic |

Then I should see below sections for the "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives"
| Section |
| Special Event Clearways |
| Road and Lane Closures |
| Speed Limit Reductions |
| Download Maps |

Then I should be able to expand and close below section from the "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives"
| Section | Info |
| Special Event Clearways | Mona Vale Road between Property No.425 to Kitchener St |

Then I should be able to expand and close below section from the "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives"
| Section | Info |
| Road and Lane Closures | Karuah Road between Eastern Road and Turramurra Avenue |

Then I should be able to expand and close below section from the "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives"
| Section | Info |
| Speed Limit Reductions | SPEED LIMIT REDUCED FROM 90KM/H TO 60KM/H: |

Then I should be able to expand and close below section from the "Turramurra, Kur-Ring-Gai Chase National Park, St Ives"
| Section | Info |
| Download Maps | Bobbin Head Cycle Classic - Mona Vale Rd Clearway map (1060 KB) |
And I should see "View on Map" button in the incident details section
When I click "View on Map" button
Then I should see Incident display name as "Bobbin Head Rd, Mona Vale Rd"
